column2: an A.M. Eatery////The food was good. I had the bravocado toast and I really liked it but it was not above average. I also tried the pancake sampler and out of the 3
column3: my favorite was the sweet potato one. As for drinks
column4: I'm not a fan of vodka but I was hungover and ordered a Bloody Mary
column5: but then I saw they have a Bloody Maria
column6: which has tequila instead of vodka so I ordered that instead and it was bomb. Definitely recommend this place for brunch. It just gets really busy and the wait time is long so if you can
column7: get on the waitlist on Yelp ahead of time
